page.title: 19LOCAL EVENTS BY MRS.G.SCOTT
page.content: The{School}at West Taphouse plays a major role in bringing the community together.Such occasions as Sports Day, School Fete, School Displays, Coffee Evenings,Christmas Service and Tea Party bring parents together. The local{Churches}also play an important part in bringing people together.Braddock and Boconnoc Churches work together for some events like the Summer Fete.They both come under the Liskeard Team Ministry. {Boconnoc Estate,}the largest land owner in the area,bring the local community together for a Harvest Supper each year. Some of the local community play cricket for{Boconnoc Cricket Club. They play in the beautiful Deer Park at Boconnoc.
